Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 18th overall pick, by Los Angeles (N) in 2008...
Injured on 8/27/2009 with a Fractured Ulna, out for 6 weeks...
Traded from Los Angeles (N) to Washington on 2/4/2010 (Going to WSH: P R. Blackmer, 3B J. Darnell, 2B D. Taylor, 1B G. Sanchez, CF M. Brunson. Going to LAN: 1B B. Eldred, LF J. Borchard)...
Traded from Washington to Kansas City on 2/23/2010 (Going to WSH: P D. Graves. Going to KCA: CF M. Brunson, P J. Saunders, 3B J. Darnell)...
Injured on 7/6/2010 with a Torn Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for full season...
Released by Kansas City on 8/16/2011...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 8/16/2011 to a minor league deal...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/12/2013, off Sean Henn (TEX)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/26/2013, off Chris Capuano (SEA)...
Won World Championship with Detroit in 2017...
Injured on 7/25/2018 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/4/2021 to a 2-year deal worth $2,500,000 per year...
Injured on 8/21/2022 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for 5 days...
Signed as a free agent by Arizona on 2/17/2023 to a 1-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/10/2024 to a 1-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
